item.title: Everytime i used ::giveowner my acc gets banned
item.dc:creator: @WrittenBlade WrittenBlade
item.description:
@WrittenBlade wrote:

I lol’d reading this.

You probably removed the noclip command, and left the appendToBanned(playerName); part and the disconnected stuff. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 04:18:30 PM[/size][hr][quote=“P00P133, post:1, topic:219451”]PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!");
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;
}

Idiot[/quote]
orly? Good job.

item.description:
@steveolicious wrote:

First things first,

} else if(command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("p00n3r"))

Is your account name p00n3r? If not change it…
and some auto-ban in there :\

item.title: Everytime i used ::giveowner my acc gets banned
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

ok everytime i use ::giveowner my acc gets banned here is my code

} else if(command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("p00n3r")) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 3; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now a co-owner"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!"); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; }

can any1 find anything wrong with it
